name: nuclide-remote-atom
description: Client side of command-line interface for communicating with nuclide-server

shouldNotifyWhenRemoteServerIsWaitingOnF.title: Notify when the remote server is waiting on an open file.
shouldNotifyWhenRemoteServerIsWaitingOnF.description: Show a notification when a file is opened locally by the remote server and the remote server is waiting for the file to be closed.
